patthana21.48:1.1_0: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.48:2.1_0: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana21.48:2.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.48:3.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.48:4.1_0: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ,
